claims.claim_text: A method comprising: (a) combining an active pharmaceutical ingredient with a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier; (b) granulating the blend at 40 C for 20 minutes; (c) drying the granules to a moisture content below 2%.

description.description_text:
In one embodiment, the process includes (a) preparing a granulation blend; (b) wet granulating the blend; (c) drying the granules. The blend may be warmed to 35 C.

Then the dried granules are milled for 5 minutes prior to tablet compression.
